en_US.description: This mod allows you to modify the profiles of your NPCs, so that they are closer to their thoughts. For example, Anomen becomes a Priest of Helm when he successfully completes the Order of the Radiant Heart, and a Berserker if he fails, Imoen and Nalia become adventurers (thief profile) or mages, Edwin a Red Wizard, Korgan an Enraged (fighter kit), Sarevok a Sower of Death, Mazzy a Paladin of Arvoreen, Minsc has his kit name changed to Rashmenian Ranger, and so on.

components.31: Replace Berserker Kit with Battlerager for Dwarves
components.400: Anomen Gains Helm Kit on Passing Knighthood Test
components.410: Anomen Gains Berserker Kit on Failing Knighthood Test
components.420: Prevent CN Anomen Gaining a Holy Symbol
components.900: Add Red Wizard to Edwin's Kit Description
components.2200: Give Mazzy a Proper Truesword of Arvoreen Kit
components.2300: Change Minsc's Title to Rashemaar Ranger
components.2800: Give Sarevok a Proper Deathbringer Kit

fr_FR.description: Ce mod permet de modifier les profils de vos PNJ, afin qu'ils soient plus proches de leurs pensées. Entre autres, Anomen devient prêtre de Heaume lorsqu'il réussit son adoubement à l'Ordre du Cœur Radieux et devient un Berserker s'il le rate, Imoen et Nalia deviennent des aventurières (profil de voleur) ou des mages, Edwin un Sorcier rouge, Korgan un Enragé (profil de guerrier), Sarevok un Semeur de mort, Mazzy un Paladin d'Arvoreen, Minsc voit le nom de son kit modifié en rôdeur de Rashéménie, etc.

components.30: Amelioration de la description des Mages Specialistes
components.31: Remplace pour les nains le kit du Berserker par un kit d'Enrage
components.400: Anomen devient Pretre de Helm apres avoir reussi le Test de Chevalerie
components.410: Anomen devient Berserker apres avoir echoue au Test de Chevalerie
components.420: Empeche Anomen Chaotique Neutre de gagner un Symbole Sacre
components.900: Ajoute Sorcier Rouge a la description de la classe d'Edwin
components.1400: Donne a Imoen le Kit d'Aventurier
components.choice_0: Donne a Imoen un kit de mage
components.2100: Change le Kit de Korgan en Enrage
components.2200: Fait de Mazzy une vraie Lame consacree d'Arvoreen
components.2300: Change le titre de Minsc en Rodeur de Rashemenie
components.2500: Donne a Nalia le Kit d'Aventurier
components.choice_1: Donne a Nalia un kit de mage
components.2800: Donne a Sarevok le vrai Kit de Semeur de Mort

components.30: Migliora le descrizioni del Mago Specialista
components.31: Sostituisci il Kit Berserker con Furia Battagliera per i Nani
components.400: Anomen ottiene il Kit di Helm superando la Prova per il Cavalierato
components.410: Anomen ottiene il Kit Berserker fallendo la Prova per il Cavalierato
components.420: Impedisci che Anomen CN ottenga il Simbolo Sacro
components.900: Aggiungi Stregone Rosso alla descrizione del Kit di Edwin
components.1400: Da' ad Imoen il Kit da Avventuriero
components.choice_0: Da' ad Imoen un Kit da Mago
components.2100: Cambia il Kit di Korgan in Furia Battagliera
components.2200: Da' a Mazzy un appropriato Kit Spada della Fede di Arvoreen
components.2300: Cambia il titolo di Minsc in Ranger di Rashemen
components.2500: Da' a Nalia il Kit da Avventuriero
components.choice_1: Da' a Nalia il Kit da Mago
components.2800: Da' a Sarevok un appropriato Kit del Latore di Morte

components.31: Replace Berserker Kit with Battlerager for Dwarves
components.400: Anomen Gains Helm Kit on Passing Knighthood Test
components.410: Anomen Gains Berserker Kit on Failing Knighthood Test
components.420: Prevent CN Anomen Gaining a Holy Symbol
components.900: Add Red Wizard to Edwin's Kit Description
components.2200: Give Mazzy a Proper Truesword of Arvoreen Kit
components.2300: Change Minsc's Title to Rashemaar Ranger
components.2800: Give Sarevok a Proper Deathbringer Kit

zh_CN.description: 这个模组可以修改您NPC的职业档案，使他们更符合他们的想法。除此之外，阿诺门在成功加入最高贵的光辉之心骑士团后成为海姆的牧师，如果失败则成为狂战士；爱蒙和娜里亚成为冒险者（盗贼职业档案）或法师；艾德温成为红袍术士；寇根成为狂怒者（战士职业档案）；沙洛佛克成为死亡播种者；玛兹成为阿尔孚琳的圣武士；明斯克的宗派名称被修改为拉西曼游侠，等等。

components.31: Zamien podklase "Berserkera" na "Krasnoludzkiego Berserkera" dla Krasnoludow
components.400: Anomen dostaje podklase "Kaplana Helma" gdy ukonczy Test Rycerskosci
components.410: Anomen dostaje podklase "Berserkera" gdy nie powiedzie mu sie Test Rycerskosci
components.420: Zapobiegaj otrzymaniu symbolu przez Chaotycznego Neutralnego Anomena
components.900: Dodanie "Czerwonego Maga" do opisu podklasy Edwina
components.1400: Zamieñ podklase Z³odzieja Imoen na "Poszukiwacza Przygod"
components.2200: Zamien podklase Mazzy na "Miecz Prawdy Arvoreen"

components.31: Cambiar el Kit Bersérker por Guerrero Rabioso para los enanos
components.400: Anomen obtiene el Perfil de Helmo al pasar la Prueba de la Orden
components.410: Anomen obtiene el Perfil de Bersérker al fallar la Prueba de la Orden
components.420: Evitar que Anomen CN obtenga un Símbolo Sagrado
components.900: Añadir Mago Rojo a la descripción del Perfil de Edwin
components.1400: Dar a Imoen el Perfil de Aventurero
components.choice_0: Dar a Imoen el kit de Maga
components.2100: Cambiar el Perfil de Korgan a Guerrero Rabioso
components.2200: Dar a Mazzy el Perfil de Espada Veraz de Arvorin
components.2300: Cambiar el Título de Minsc a Explorador Rashemaar
components.2500: Dar a Nalia el Perfil de Aventurero
components.choice_1: Dar a Nalia el kit de Maga
components.2800: Dar a Sarevok el Perfil de Portador de la Muerte
